news.title: Bitcoin Briefly Crashes Below $48,000 on Upstart Exchange
news.snippet: Despite a broader crypto rally, a flash crash occurred on a new exchange platform, briefly sending BTC prices plummeting before stabilizing back near $69,000.

news.title: Over 400,000 BTC Bought Between $60k and $70k
news.snippet: On-chain data shows massive accumulation as investors buy the dip during Bitcoinâ€™s latest downward volatility.

news.title: Trump Tariffs Send Bitcoin Lower to $66K
news.snippet: Aggressive tariff announcements from the Trump administration have rattled both domestic stock and crypto markets, leading to increased "Bitcoin to zero" searches.
